item.description:
Have some great tats you want to show off? Are you a tattoo artist that wants to show off your work? Here is the time and place to do it. Artists, Models, Hair and MUA all welcome to attend.

Photographers, Looking for something a little edgier to add to your portfolio? Here is your chance. We will have local shops and tattooed models to show off and add to your portfolio.

$40 for photographers. Prepayment required. Paypal; payment@worcesterphotostudio.com (reference the shoot), cash or credit card at th e studio in advance. 

Any artists looking to do some work while here, contact me at Chris@worcesterphotostudios.com 

What to bring: Photographers should bring their own lights. There will be space for indoor and outdoor shooting. Props are encouraged. Models just bring your tattooed selves. Artists are welcome to bring business cards, models and equipment. 

Code of conduct:

Alcohol and drugs are strictly prohibited at all times.

If you are attending one of our events, please take a moment to review this. 

This is an 18+ event. Inappropriate behavior will result in a verbal warning by a WPS staff member. If such behavior continues, you will be asked to leave.

These rules are put in place for everyone's safety and comfort. Any questions about Code Of Conduct or studio rules can be directed to Chris@worcesterphotostudios.com
item.name: Tattoo Shoot
